DataSource.ScriptBody:
param ($sourceId, $managedEntityId, $computerName)
# Manual Testing section - put stuff here for manually testing script - typically parameters: #================================================================================= # $sourceId = '{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000}' # $managedEntityId = '{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000}' # $computerName = "device.domain.com" #=================================================================================
# Constants section - modify stuff here: #================================================================================= # ScriptName should be the same as the ID of the module that the script is contained in $ScriptName = "VeeamBackupSqlServer.ps1" $EventID = "3209"
# Starting Script section - All scripts get this #================================================================================= # Gather the start time of the script $StartTime = Get-Date #Set variable to be used in logging events $whoami = whoami # Load MOMScript API $momapi = New-Object -comObject MOM.ScriptAPI #Log script event that we are starting task $momapi.LogScriptEvent($ScriptName,$EventID,0,"`nScript is starting. `nRunning as ($whoami).`n Computer Name: $computerName") #=================================================================================
# Discovery Script section - Discovery scripts get this #================================================================================= # Load SCOM Discovery module $DiscoveryData = $momapi.CreateDiscoveryData(0,$SourceId,$ManagedEntityId) #=================================================================================
# Begin MAIN script section #=================================================================================
$SQLServer=$computerName $SQLDB="master"
$sqlquery="select name from sys.databases"
$Connection = New-Object System.Data.SQLClient.SQLConnection $Connection.ConnectionString = "server='$SQLServer';database='$SQLDB';trusted_connection=false; integrated security='true'" try { $connection.Open() $command = $Connection.CreateCommand() $command.CommandText = $sqlquery
$DtTable = New-Object "System.Data.Datatable" $result = $command.ExecuteReader() $DtTable.Load($result) #$Result=$DtTable $momapi.LogScriptEvent($ScriptName,$EventID,0,"`nVeeamBackup database found")
} catch { $momapi.LogScriptEvent($ScriptName,$EventID,0,"`nVeeamBackup database not found") return }
if ($DtTable.Name -contains "VeeamBackup") { "Found VeeamBackup Database" $entity = $ComputerName +"_VeeamBackup" # Discovery Script section - Discovery scripts get this $instance = $DiscoveryData.CreateClassInstance("$MPElement[Name='Custom.Veeam.Backups.vbkpSQLServer.Class']$") $instance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='Windows!Microsoft.Windows.Computer']/PrincipalName$", $ComputerName)
$instance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='Custom.Veeam.Backups.vbkpSQLServer.Class']/ImagePath$", $StartTime.ToString()) $instance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='Custom.Veeam.Backups.vbkpSQLServer.Class']/Description$", "VeeamBackup SQL Server") $instance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='Custom.Veeam.Backups.vbkpSQLServer.Class']/DisplayName$", $ComputerName) $instance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='Custom.Veeam.Backups.vbkpSQLServer.Class']/ObjectName$", $entity)
$instance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='System!System.Entity']/DisplayName$", $entity) $DiscoveryData.AddInstance($instance) $momapi.LogScriptEvent($ScriptName,$EventID,0,"`nAdded instance: $entity at $($StartTime.ToString())") } else { "VeeamBackup not found" }
$DiscoveryData # Return Discovery Bag to the command line for testing (does not work from ISE) # $momapi.Return($DiscoveryData)
#================================================================================= # End MAIN script section #================================================================================= #Log an event for script ending and total execution time. $EndTime = Get-Date $ScriptTime = ($EndTime - $StartTime).TotalSeconds $momapi.LogScriptEvent($ScriptName,$EventID,0,"`nScript Completed. `nRuntime: ($ScriptTime) seconds.") #================================================================================= # End of script

RegExExpression.Pattern: Backup Copy job .*$Target/Property[Type="System!System.Entity"]/DisplayName$.* finished with Success
Backup Copy job .*$Target/Property[Type="System!System.Entity"]/DisplayName$.* finished with Failed
Catalyst Replication job .*$Target/Property[Type="System!System.Entity"]/DisplayName$.* finished with Success
Catalyst Replication job .*$Target/Property[Type="System!System.Entity"]/DisplayName$.* finished with Failed
Retry of Backup job .*$Target/Property[Type="System!System.Entity"]/DisplayName$.* finished with Success
Retry of Backup job .*$Target/Property[Type="System!System.Entity"]/DisplayName$.* finished with Failed

ColumnInfo.Name: Offset In Minutes From Greenwich Time
